entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baie-James
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
